subject: Baseball
Drug Abuse and Traffic
lead_paragraph: At a news conference Friday in Arizona, where the Dodgers are opening their new camp, Joe Torre spoke about his time as the Yankees’ manager and Alex Rodriguez. Torre said the news about Rodriguez, who played for him for four years with the Yankees, was particularly difficult for him. “I was very saddened, knowing Alex personally and knowing how proud he is of everything he’s done, not only on the baseball field but preparing to go on the baseball field,” Torre said. “I don’t think I’ve ever been around anybody who works harder than him.
